DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate bioequivalence of a newly developed fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet containing linagliptin and metformin extended release compared to the free combination of linagliptin and metformin extended release.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a FDC Tablet of Linagliptin/Metformin (2.5mg/750mg) Extended Release in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male or female subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy condition
